org.sxb.plugin.activerecord

クラス ActiveRecordPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.plugin.activerecord.ActiveRecordPlugin
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    IPlugin

    public class ActiveRecordPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlugin
    ActiveRecord plugin.
    ActiveRecord plugin not support mysql type year, you can use int instead of year. Mysql error message for type year when insert a record: Data truncated for column 'xxx' at row 1
